title: We Luv Our Residents and We'd Luv For You To Be The Next!!!
posting_body: Welcome to eaves San Jose, located in Santa Clara County, where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living.
We offer quality San Jose apartments that feature a few little extras, like cherry cabinetry with modern hardware in the kitchens and bathrooms, along with wood burning fireplaces.

In addition to our well-appointed apartments and convenient location, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more.
Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.
Simply put, our San Jose apartments offer more of what you hope for.
So, what are you waiting for?
